qa_pairs.question: What is the IECEx and ATEX rating for the Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB)?
qa_pairs.evaluation_criteria: Answer must state the certification (Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb) and the standards (IECEx and ATEX).
qa_pairs.answer: The Axess Data Collection Unit (AXDCUHB) is certified to Ex ia IIC T4 Ga/Gb under both IECEx and ATEX standards.
